topics.body:
You know what is kind of sad nowadays?  Back in the day people that internet trolled did stuff like the mountain dew "hitler did nothing wrong" poll bombing, the Iphone microwave prank or such.  Nowadays trolling is just people going:
[spoiler]!http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/738/036/b29.jpg![/spoiler]
When you get down to it the internet is creatively bankrupt when it comes to internet pranks now and we're probably not going to see a magnificent bastard like Cally from EVE online or such again.

It's like saying that someone is as funny as Robin Williams then when the persons get on the stage they just say a bunch of Family Guy quotes.

topics.body:
So apparently Reddit is metaphorically dead.

The new mods are across the board shadowbanning anyone with any sort of ideological differences; not for actually breaking the rules, but rather if you disagree with staff on political or ideological things you're going to get banned.
"Well why isn't <x> banned yet?"
Simply put because of how many people have ideological differences on reddit it's going to take months to purge all the people who have difference of opinion cause not all people of different political opinions are constantly vocal about it so getting rid of every last person who has different political ideology than the CEO will take quite a fucking while.

Tl:dr; reddit is purging anyone who disagrees with their political ideology.
